choices.A: They can block DNS requests to known botnet command and control servers
choices.C: They must be applied in firewall policies with SSL inspection enabled
choices.D: They can redirect blocked requests to a specific portal

discussion.content: A & D are correct - FGT_Security-6.2, p. 404

questions.question_text: Which two statements about DNS filter profiles are true? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: A,B & D are correct - FGT_Security-6.2, p. 605

questions.question_text:
An administrator needs to strengthen the security for SSL VPN access.
Which three statements are best practices to do so? (Choose three.)

choices.B: Configure two-factor authentication using security certificates.
choices.E: Configure SSL offloading to a content processor.
choices.D: Configure host restrictions by IP address or by MAC address.

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit.
//IMG//

An administrator is investigating a report of users having intermittent issues with browsing the web. The administrator ran diagnostics and received the output shown in the exhibit.
Which option is the most likely cause of the issue?
Which process is involved in updating IPS from FortiGuard?

choices.B: FortiGate IPS update requests are sent using UDP port 443.
choices.A: IPS engine updates can be obtained using only push updates.
choices.C: IPS signature update requests are sent to update.fortiguard.net.
choices.D: Protocol decoder update requests are sent to sevice.fortiguard.net.

discussion.content: C is correct. FortiGate Security 6.2 Page 558

choices.B: If the VPN is configured as DialUp User in one peer, it must be configured as either Static IP Address or Dynamic DNS in the other peer.
choices.A: If the VPN is configured as policy-based in one peer, it must also be configured as policy-based in the other peer.
choices.C: If XAuth is enabled as a server in one peer, it must be enabled as a client in the other peer.
choices.D: If the VPN is configured as route-based, there must be at least one firewall policy with the action set to IPsec.

discussion.content: B & Care correct - FGT_Security-6.2, p.649, p.654

questions.question_text: Which two conditions are required for establishing an IPsec VPN between two FortiGate devices? (Choose two.)
